page.title: 13Government
page.content: Acton Beauchamp, Evesbatch, and Stanford Bishop are covered by a joint parish council, most members of which live within the block and are concerned to maintain the present pleasant quality of life. The other three parishes have their own parish councils. The District Council is Malvern Hills, within the county of Hereford and Worcester, and services are concentrated there, although a small local presence is maintained at Bromyard, three or more miles away.Local residents must travel considerable distances to gain access to government services which can present problems in an area poorly served by public transport. Centralised services are not heavily used since no premises have sewerage connections, there is no street lighting and many have their own water
